// src/components/Main.jsx import React, { useState } from "react"; import img1 from "../img/img1.jpg"; import img2 from "../img/img2.jpg"; import img3 from "../img/img3.jpg"; import img4 from "../img/img4.jpg"; import "../css/index.comp.css"; const Main = () => { const [showAddressForm, setShowAddressForm] = useState(false); const [address, setAddress] = useState(null); const handleAddressSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const formData = new FormData(e.target); const addressData = { address: formData.get("address"), country: formData.get("country"), state: formData.get("state"), city: formData.get("city"), postalCode: formData.get("postalCode"), phoneNumber: formData.get("phoneNumber"), }; setAddress(addressData); setShowAddressForm(false); }; return (
